subject: Re: [junit] Parameterized test setup

messageBody:
Clive,

You're the second person to request this in two weeks, so it looks like a
good feature to consider for JUnit 4.4. Right now, unfortunately, you may
be best off kludging around it, by detecting in the constructor if the
parameters have changed, and taking action accordingly. I know it's
ugly--sorry about that.

David Saff

On 4/2/07, cliveborrageiro <cliveborrageiro@...> wrote:
>
> Hi,
>
> I'm using a Parameterized test and would like to perform a single
> setup state (like @BeforeClass) for all test methods to use. This
> setup method needs to use the parameter passed into the constructor.
>
> The problem is that @BeforeClass needs to be static and is called
> before the constructor, there I'm unable to get the parameter for the
> setup.
>
> Any suggestions...
> Thank you,
> Clive
